20100.name: Saving Santa Hat - 24-hour limited period
20100.description: This festive holiday hat allows you to participate in a "Rock-Paper-Scissors" contest with Thomas D. Turkey. Requires 2 hair accessory slots. It cannot be exchanged, dropped or sold. Scissors

20101.name: Santa Claus' Gift Set
20101.description: A gift set given by Santa Claus to show his appreciation.

20102.description: A gift set given by Santa Claus to show his appreciation.

20103.name: Holiday Scroll: Heavy Armor Fighter - 8-hour limited period
20103.description: This magical scroll contains buffs for Fighters wearing heavy armor. It can be used once every hour. It cannot be exchanged, dropped or sold. Christmas Festival

20189.name: Premium Valentine Decoration Pack
20189.description: Wrapped pack contains a Premium Valentine Decoration. Cannot be exchanged, dropped or sold.

20190.name: Premium Valentine Decoration - 15-day limited period
20190.description: Take this along with a Decadent Valentine Cake to Valentine Messenger Queen of Hearts, and she will create a Heavenly Valentine Cake just for you. Cannot be exchanged, dropped or sold.

20191.name: Valentine Cake Recipe
20191.description: Recipe for making a Simple Valentine Cake. Cannot be exchanged, dropped or sold.

20192.name: Valentine Dark Chocolate
20192.description: Ingredient for making a Valentine Cake.

20193.name: Valentine White Chocolate
20193.description: Ingredient for making a Valentine Cake.

20194.name: Valentine Fresh Cream
20194.description: Ingredient for making a Valentine Cake.

20195.name: Simple Valentine Cake
20195.description: A basic Valentine Cake. With a little more care, you might be able to make a Velvety Valentine Cake. Double-click to see what happens. Shabby Valentine Cake

20196.name: Velvety Valentine Cake
20196.description: A creamy Valentine Cake. With a little more care, you may be able to make a Velvety Valentine Cake. Double-click to see what happens. Ordinary Valentine Cake

20197.name: Delectable Valentine Cake
20197.description: A yummy and inviting Valentine Cake. With a little more care, you might be able to make a Decadent Valentine Cake. Double-click to see what happens. Delicious Valentine Cake

20198.name: Decadent Valentine Cake
20198.description: This is a perfect Valentine delicacy. Double-clicking this item will yield a special Valentine treat. Perfect Valentine Cake

20199.name: Heavenly Valentine Cake - 30-day limited period
20199.description: A divine confection made with love and care. Double-click to transform into a fabulous reward. Cannot be exchanged, dropped or sold. Fantasy Valentine Cake
